name: Nirvana (Yovel kdoshim)
description:
Nirvana is a gaming experience of Zen, peace of mind, and self-discovery.

Wonder the desert in order to achieve control of the nature's elements- By solving puzzles and overcoming obstacles along your way.

The game is a single-player. Use arrow keys (Left & Right) to move, space key for jump, and E key to interact with objects.

This game was made as a part of Game Jam course, by students from the visual communication department at Bezalel Design Academy and computer science at The Hebrew University in Jerusalem.
Developed by Anton Loubman and Idan Shfarir
Designed by Liora Doviner and Yovel Kdoshim

A big thank you for our teachers-
Dani Bacon, Eran Hilleli, Lior Bruder, Avishai Simhovitch, and Omer Zadok.

Music by Boards of Canada
